# ios_vlan (Data Source)

Vlan data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ios_vlan" "example" {
  id = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) The VLAN ID to retrieve. This is a required field and must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `name` (String)
